article_text:
Cynthia Weil has co-written many a hit song with her husband, Barry Mann, including “On Broadway” and “We Gotta Get Out of This Place,” and the couple’s partnership plays a large part in “Beautiful: The Carole King Musical.”

That doesn’t mean it was easy for her to sell a novel.

Two attempts remain in the proverbial drawer, but her third try, “I’m Glad I Did,” was published on Tuesday by Soho Teen. She was planning to...

Cynthia Weil has co-written many a hit song with her husband, Barry Mann, including “On Broadway” and “We Gotta Get Out of This Place,” and the couple’s partnership plays a large part in “Beautiful: The Carole King Musical.”That doesn’t mean it was easy for her to sell a novel.
